experience.title: Data Analyst
bullets: Designed and implemented 5 Python scripts for data cleaning and preprocessing, improving data pipeline efficiency by 30% and processing 100K records weekly.
Developed machine learning models in Python for predictive analytics, enabling data-driven business decisions that increased revenue by 20% and enhanced donor-centricity.
Leveraged AI techniques to automate repetitive tasks, reducing manual effort by 25% and improving productivity across the team in social impact projects.
Built dynamic dashboards and visualizations using Python libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn to communicate insights effectively, enhancing stakeholder engagement in fundraising initiatives.
Integrated Google Analytics data with Python for advanced analysis, enhancing customer behavior insights and contributing to international aid strategies and campaign outcomes.

experience.title: Data Analyst
bullets: Automated data extraction and structuring of population datasets using Python, improving data accuracy by 40% and enhancing team collaboration on charitable initiatives.
Analyzed customer support data with Python to optimize response times, reducing average response time by 15% and enhancing operational efficiency for marketing campaigns.
Developed Python-based solutions to generate actionable insights, meeting strict deadlines for strategic decision-making that improved customer satisfaction scores by 20%.
Designed Python scripts to create dynamic reports and dashboards, significantly improving decision-making processes for fundraising initiatives and non-profit data analysis.

experience.title: Software Engineer and Analyst
bullets: Built Python scripts to track key metrics, ensuring 99% data accuracy and improving data integrity and operational efficiency for humanitarian aid projects.

Supported cross-functional teams with Python-driven insights, enabling customer-focused initiatives and enhancing stakeholder management for charitable initiatives and humanitarian emergencies.

experience.title: Research Assistant
bullets: Utilized advanced Python programming for computational modeling and solving complex research problems, contributing to social impact data analysis.
Developed Python-based workflows to manage and analyze large datasets across multiple research projects, improving data reliability by 30%.
Presented Python-enabled research findings at international conferences, demonstrating technical expertise and effective stakeholder communication.

experience.title: Lecturer and Course Facilitator
bullets: Led engaging physics tutorials for master’s students, enhancing understanding and promoting teamwork, resulting in a 25% increase in student engagement.
Designed course materials, assignments, and exams, strengthening the learning experience and improving student performance metrics.
